snippet: The company that controls the rights to songs by the group Trouble Funk sued over music it says was used on the Beastie Boys' albums "Paul's Boutique" and "Licensed to Ill."
abstract: The company that controls the rights to songs by the group Trouble Funk sued over music it says was used on the Beastie Boys' albums "Paul's Boutique" and "Licensed to Ill."

headline.main: Beastie Boys Face New Suit Over Sampling
headline.print_headline: Beastie Boys Face A New Lawsuit ...
